div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2358 Marseille (anc. Massalia), 1849 (658-9) Burial: end of 3rd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 403 AE. Pot hoard Massalia: 400 (Apollo/bull type, 20 mm.) Carthage: 1 Sardinian mint (as SNGCop. 387) Roman Rep.: 2 Disposition: unknown Marquis de Lagoy, RN 1849, pp. 323-4 Blanchet, Trait√©, p. 544, no. 23 Crawford, RRCH 79 Noe 659 duplicates 658.
